summary: "The Walking Dead" is an American TV show about a group of people trying to survive after the world is taken over by zombies, called "walkers." Based on a comic book, the series follows these survivors as they face not only zombies but also other human groups with different rules and morals. It first aired in 2010 and ended in 2022 after 11 seasons. The show was very popular and led to several spin-offs and games. It starred Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, and many others.
title: The Walking Dead (TV series)
